Review.Titre: Steady Stack is the real deal
Review.Contenu: Steady Stack is the real deal.  It's the first (and perhaps only) web3 project I've seen that is based on sound business strategy.  When most NFT projects were about profile pictures, Steady Stack offered utility as soon as the Discord group opened before anyone even minted.  Post-mint, the funds were used to invest back into the project and add a wide array of new value and utility for its members.To put it concisely, Steady Stack provides the education and resources to elevate your trading, investment, business, and life in general.  Perhaps the best way to convey the value of Steady Stack is through its community members' loyalty:The tokens that grant membership to this community have a market value of over $8000 (and some of them would probably sell for MUCH more than that).  Over 70% of these tokens are hard staked.  That means their owners could not sell them -- even if they wanted to -- until the end of the staking period. Many of these tokens are staked for ***3 YEARS.***  Most of that staking happened within a few hours after it became available. Some members of the community were asking for EVEN LONGER staking periods!If you are looking for a community that will help you level up, you have found it.

I know it's hard to believe what is done here but the fact that the founders show up every day and both are extremely motivating and looking for feedback from the community is the synergy needed to achieve anything.And what was done so far is only the tip of the iceberg.

Review.Contenu: Steady Stack is setting a new standard in trading communities. The founders, educators, and alpha callers all have true expertise, so it's refreshing to not have to sort through a bunch of crap separating the diamonds from the rough, but just to be able to log in and see timely, succinct, relevant info needed to succeed in trading. I joined when they launched back in March 2022 and have only been more and more impressed as time goes on, they keep building and adding new tools and refining systems. This is more than just education or algorithms, it's a true ecosystem and network with EVERYTHING one needs to be set up for success in one's own trading journey.

Review.Titre: If I could only hold one NFT for the rest of my life...
Review.Contenu: I came to Steady Stacks looking for a "one stop shop" in the world of crypto and NFT's. I was looking market updates, trading advice and most importantly, investment opportunities. I have been with Steady Stacks since mint and it has exceeded my expectations. I have made my money back times 10x just from the 5 tykes I was able to purchase and stake. I have also been able to partner with other projects and provide my wellness coaching service make 4 figures here as well. I have earned lucrative WL spots and will now be able to buy 2 VIP tickets to the first Steady Stake and Tykes meetup with my passive tycoin all because of Steady Stack. The community is second to none in the space and one of the only projects that I do not plan on selling anytime soon.

Review.Titre: Steady Stack has been a game-changer…
Review.Contenu: Steady Stack has been a game-changer for me. It is the future of NFT's and Web3. The team is the best alpha callers in many areas, and they always live up to their hype. They continue to add and grow beyond belief.

SteadyStack is hands down the #1 community to be a part of as well as the NFT to own. With excellent leaders and strong communication, this journey had made my life better from a work perspective and at home. I’ve learned how to be a better trader from the masterclass, better presenter/leader at work and so much more. I was very lucky to grab a couple titans early and very fortunate to own 10. The value packed by owning just 1 Titan is completely overlooked. I have made over 20x profit on trades from Beau’s trades as well as tools and strategy from Xans masterclass and live trading classes. The news reports, weekly news letters are all you need to stay up to date. This community is a one stop shop - you don’t need 100 different discord servers, just this one. Grab one before it gets completely out reach!

Review.Titre: Enter the next gen of NFTs
Review.Contenu: I am a recent joiner in the Steady Stack community after roaming around in other projects for over a year. Have been looking for a community and team which have a clear direction, vision and execution plan which I found in Steady Stack. Momentarily I am enjoying the trading master class to develop a solid foundation and next to this following Beau's every word to slowly absorb his knowledge and skill. Would definitely recommend to everyone who either wants to up their trading game or wants to join a solid community with a bright future.

I’ve had a great experience joining steady stacks since their discord opened back in march. The key for me was to grow my business network, and gain more knowledge as well, with all areas in business - I’m in the process of growing a marketing agency so this is key for me - e.g. sales, marketing etc.. Going into the new year I will be utilising their property and trading division which I have seen profitable for many others in the discord, great to see everyone doing well. There is a clear ROI joining SS. You have everything to gain in all areas of business.What’s it like being in the community? Well, you’ll have easy access to some top level business people, investors and people learning on the same level as you, which helps with accountability and pushing you on as well

Over many years of stock trading, I was definitely in the red overall and was lacking a true vision of micro and macro market cycles. Steady Stack brought so much to light for me and my wife, allowing us to trade with much more confidence with the assistance of trading algorithm software and expert level human traders who are available at almost any hour of the day, within the private Discord server. We are still growing our portfolio and have been mostly in profit, even during the recent downturn of the market. I know that Steady Stack will continue to level up our trading knowledge and will provide immense value in the near and distant future!

I have been with Steady Stack since the beginning. So I have seen how this has blossomed into such a impressive community. The networking alone is off the charts. My understanding and knowledge of the markets and Web 3 space has grown so much.

Joining the steady stack "investor illuminati" was the best investment decision I've made in 2022. I am a new investor, but the 80% hit rate on Beau's trades are no joke. This is the first real utility NFT project I've seen yet.

It genuinely does not stop stacking REAL utilities here, helping all the Steady Stack Titans to Steadily Stack.

Review.Titre: Steady Stack is shaping the future of it's members.
Review.Contenu: I have had the most amazing experience since being a part of Steady Stack.For 10+ years I have had no idea on what I wanted to do with my life but I knew that I wanted to do something great and be surrounded by smart people who have the same goals.Steady Stack has helped me to align my dreams to reality by providing all of the resources I need + more alongside an incredible network of teachers / learners and all sorts of people from all over the world.They have bought me great value in opportunities.Since March 2022 I have grown to be able to make money for myself using what Steady Stack has provided.The biggest win for me is being able to trade the stock market efficiently, having learnt from the Steady Stack trading masterclass.Since October I have already taken my trading account from $1k to $5k trading off of my own knowledge.This has created the chance to grow my wealth exponentially.
A community dedicated to everybody’s financial growth has been life changing. They have given me multiple skill sets that will have huge impacts on my life going forward.

Been with them for awhile. They are always looking for ways to deliver more quality so that everyone that is a part of the community can get the most.  They offer so much that you don't have time for everything but gives you opportunity to choose your niche.

I found Steady Stack by chance and now i can say i was blessed.Before i was struggling to find a community who could fit my way of beeing and who could put me in contact with bussines- minded people like me.I was alone trying to networking and finding useful info and opportunities, all by myself. I didn't know exactly what i was looking for, until i find Steady Stack and suddenly everything was clear to my eyes.Now i feel part of a strong community made of talented and dedicatet people who always look and think three moves ahead. I had consistent gains tanks to all the great calls made in the discord daily, i learned a lot just reading from true masters in trading, crypto and nft, and i feel proud to be part of this, even if i have just scratched the surface and not explored the full potential yet.I bought my first Titan this last september, so i am not an OG member, but i fell in so much love with this project that now i own 7 Titans and i am not stopping till i reach 10.

Review.Titre: Steady Stack providing unparalleled investent value
Review.Contenu: I first heard about Steady Stack in April 2022 through another Web3 community. When I started looking at the utility being planned within this project it was almost to the point of being so much that I questioned if it could be delivered but listening to ReadyPlayerH and Xan I thought it was worth a shot. I was so glad I did as the utility has actually exceeded my expectation. Admittedly, I don't make use of a lot of the utility (e.g. around stock trading) but I have used some of the NFT calls with about 70% making a profit and the remaining 30% breaking even. i.e. I am yet to make a loss on any NFT calls.I was also looking at ways to prepare for the next bull market by learning better ways to research projects. Steady Stack has been a great help in me developing better research techniques as well. For me, this is easily the most valuable utility driven Web3 project I'm involved in

Review.Titre: This is what I want to call community…
Review.Contenu: This is what I want to call community and a good place to be if you seek a team of likeminded masters who never want to be broke or alone. I have find my freedom I want to have. God bless the team and community
Transparency and integrity is key when it comes to the NFT market and the Steady Stack team goes above and beyond when it comes to delivering. Most underrated NFT project of 2023!

Before Steady Stack, I was struggling to find strong communities with a good network of quality people and a concise, thorough and accurate infromation ecosystem about the various topics that I am interested in e.g. news in the crypto space, NFT alpha etc. Now, I have x20 my NFT portfolio on my initial investment in the project and have made some extremely valuable connection which has led me to set up my own web3 developer agency and in my first month, have secured two clients with more pending!The team has curated a strong, professional, positive and optimistic enviornment. RPH, Beau, Xan and the rest of the team are always around to talk with their holders and I have been really impressed with the clear and concise communication line they have established with the community
Words couldn’t even describe how thankful I am for being part of this journey!!

Do you want to learn how to trade stocks/option/nfts? We have number #1 experts which provides you knowledge and calls to each trade which you can be part of. Do you want to be a part of community which keep pushing forward to give the best results? Come and join our family, this is long runner and we are still in the beginning. Value of this thing is unbelievable. Thanks to the team. Cannot wait what 2023 will brings to the house.
Full education with coaching on trading has given my life a different trajectory. While the initial investment into steady stack has gained me over $9400 in value since mint

Underpromiss and overdeliver is a best sum up of this brand name. Constantly innovating and expanding, providing quality immediate support in a easily understandable and friendly way. Investment paid off almost immediately, constantly earning cash flow with multiple ways that Steady Stack provides. To join this group is the best financial decision i've ever done

The Titans community is the cream of the crop. The knowledge gain and value add to my trading game has been invaluable. From learning to trade to flipping NFT’s there is no subject the Titans do no not excel in.

Review.Titre: Bull or bear, this is the best community
Review.Contenu: I’ve been in Steady Stack since they opened the discord with 130 people in there. I also max minted 4 so I’m truly a day one Steady Stacker. I believed in the vision they set out to create and they’re accomplishing it and then some. I wanted to join because I felt lost on how to progress further in this space, and I wanted a killer group to run with. Everyone in this community serves each other. When I had questions about leverage trading and being brand new, 3-4 members immediately responded with help and info on dos and don’ts. They walked me through the whole process. The outreach team is a beast, they put in so much work for us. Due to them, I’ve been able to secure WLs to some of the best upcoming mints. The combination of teaching from Xan, Beau, Rippy, etc has been eye opening on what’s possible with trading. But there really is something for anyone, whether it’s real estate, mental fortitude, web3, content creation, etc. I really think Steady Stack is the best place anyone can be, bull or bear market. I’m very grateful for the leaders and everyone in the community.

Review.Titre: I have been with Steady Stack since…
Review.Contenu: I have been with Steady Stack since mint. I knew there was something special about the team and their vision. I am an artist and dont know much about trading and looked forward to learning from this well-versed crew. They haven't disappointed!  They are patent and even offer help to non-titans, which is pretty humbling.  Steady Stack has created quite a family. So happy to be part of it . 🤝

Steady stack provides so much info and value, sometimes it feels like you can't keep up with it. Every channel and member seem to be bringing something new and valuable to the community. I can't believe I'm a titan but will be forever.

My experience began once I joined the community. I know this seems like every answer you might have heard, but in steady stack it’s different. People are there to grow their knowledge and that’s the only reason people are here. From the master classes to the swing trades we only make money

The sheer amount of education with these guys is worth the buy-in. The high hit rate of the swing-trade calls (generating over $1M in profits for holders) are worth the buy-in. The insane collab and WL giveaways are worth the buy-in.Noticing a trend here?This company truly sets itself apart from the other noise on the space. Out of 50+ projects I vetted, Steady Stack is one of two that has made it through the bear and the only one that has had a massive increase in floor price from mint(currently floating between 25-30x). I have been given more upward mobility opportunities(exclusive communities & job opps)within the space through Steady Stack than any other projects I'm involved with.Beyond the financial and professional aspect, I truly believe the lessons imparted by the Masterclasses have really changed how I view my limitations in my everyday life as well as the power I have over them and myself. I feel like multiple ball-and-chains have been removed from my hands and feet, and I can feel my strength(belief in myself) growing with each step I take. This is probably the most valuable piece I have taken away from Steady Stack to date.With current announcements leading into major growth catalysts, it's only a matter of time before this project becomes out of reach for the average investor. Get in NOW!

I was luckily in pretty early. I found  about these guys on a NT AMA and their vision of how NFT's need to change just caught me. If I can say it in one word it's this. VALUE. They provide so much value. They have different NFT&shitcoin Callers. Of course awsome beau that run's his daily marketupdates with all his heart and has great Stock picks. Awsome.Community - here for everyone. Always helping out - always creating value. Just a bunch of good folks doing good stuff. Good Trading Masterclass by Zan. And a looot of stuff hinted at👀👀.
I love Steady Stack as a community and as a brand, and I'm really glad to be able represent my community.  The quality of the shirt perfectly reflects the quality of the community and brand!

Review.Titre: Steady Stack is the real deal!
Review.Contenu: Steady Stack is the real deal!I'm usually cautious with reviews but this first sentence is absolutely accurate and I fully stand behind this brand and their team.Whether you are a trader, investor or builder. Steady Stack gives you access to the best resources.I come from the web3 side of their business as I'm a holder of their NFT collection called "Steady Stack Titans".For people not familiar with NFTs the best I can describe it is that it's a verifiable digital collectible that grants you lifetime access to the Steady Stack ecosystem. And this is a huge deal.I paid 1k€ in the past for a one-year subscription for a so-called "Hot Stock Report" where some stocks were analyzed and that was it. Now by holding a Steady Stack NFT, I have access to this and so much more. For Life!Web3 is all about community and building together.Zan, Hassan, Beau and all of the executive team have truly built the best community of all of web3 over the last 12 months.We are all like brothers and sisters constantly trying to improve and help each other and level up in life.I honestly have never experienced a more motivating digital environment than the Steady Stack ecosystem.As a beginner trader, I started to follow along with our goated trader Beau and made some great returns on stock picks. Now that I'm more advanced I want to follow his option calls where he's constantly dropping bangers. All transparently written down in a trading diary.This brings me to my next point.It's not only about trading but learning. E.g. Zan developed a trading masterclass that brings me up to speed so I can actually follow along with Beau.Titans get access to AI, Real Estate and many more masterclasses on a constant basis.And this is what makes the Titan NFT so valuable. The constant growth.I know it may sound completely crazy to you to buy an NFT. Or maybe you think it's a rug. And that's fine.But I hope I was able to give a little bit of an insight into why Steady Stack is different. And this accounts not only for the NFT but the entire company/ecosystem.If you come from the traditional web2 side you have the ability to get a taste of what Steady Stack is like by purchasing one of their courses.But if you are a growth-minded individual that wants to get far ahead in many aspects of your life I recommend starting to learn more about web3 and our community and ultimately becoming a part of it.I can promise you won't regret it!

These guys from the team all the way down to community. Are unreal. Everyone helps each other. So many Channels to learn. From web 2-3 business. Started my trading career with these guys. And it’s only going further!
